ISSUE.TITLE: [DOCS] NextJS getting started docs should have a CTA in the end
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Improve documentation ## Link [https://supabase.com/docs/guides/getting-started/quickstarts/nextjs](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/getting-started/quickstarts/nextjs) ## Describe the problem After the successful completion of the main entry point tutorial for NextJS users (?) & the wonderful output of notes fetch, there isn't any "next step" hinted at. ## Describe the improvement It would be very nice to be guided to the next step or multiple potential next steps. A more guided on-boarding flow with multiple steps is very useful both to the user and Supabase.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: Make the playwright tests always succeed (#21591) * Make the playwright tests always succeed. * Push a change to trigger the tests. * Try moving the continue-on-error on the failed step.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Refactored quickstart guides for Next.js, React, and SvelteKit (#21517)
